deploy.startCommand: ls -a && echo DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN=$DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN >> /app/.env && echo LISTENER_HOST=${LISTENER_HOST} >> /app/.env && echo LISTENER_PORT=$LISTENER_PORT >> /app/.env && echo DISCORD_CHANNEL=$DISCORD_CHANNEL >> /app/.env && echo AUTHORIZATION_TOKEN=$AUTHORIZATION_TOKEN >> /app/.env && python main.py
